content: Certainly! Another event that might be of interest is the Author Talk: The World Between Empires - Art and Identity in the Ancient Middle East, scheduled for June 22, 2021. The author, Blair Fowlkes-Childs, will discuss her book, "The World Between Empires," which explores the diverse cultural and artistic trends across Egypt, the Levant, and Mesopotamia during the period of the Roman and Parthian Empires. The talk will examine artwork, artifacts, and other visual culture documents produced under the impact of imperial power and exchange. This event could be fascinating for people who are interested in exploring the cultural and artistic landscape in the Middle East and beyond.
